author: J_P_C

comments.content:
It looks like a very heavy weight Bodoni italic. A number of Bodonis have flat-topped t's like this, but I didn't find any quite this heavy. Perhaps some stroke was added to fatten it up?

- Mike Yanega

If you're interested in a connecting script with shapes like a roman italic you might like [Eclat](http://web.archive.org/web/20100323100337/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/creative_alliance/eclat_regular/) or [Roman Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20100323100337/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/elsnerflake/roman_script_ot/).
